00024 //---------------------------------------------------------
00025 //   genCreateMenu
00026 //---------------------------------------------------------
00027 
00028 QMenu* MuseScore::genCreateMenu(QWidget* parent)
00029       {
00030       QMenu* popup = new QMenu(parent);
00031       popup->setCheckable(false);
00032       popup->insertItem(QWidget::tr("&Instruments..."),    this, SLOT(editInstrList()), Qt::Key_I, -1);
00033       popup->insertItem(QWidget::tr("Measure"),            this, SLOT(cmdAppendMeasure()), Qt::CTRL+Qt::Key_B);
00034       popup->insertItem(QWidget::tr("Bars..."),            this, SLOT(barMenu()));
00035       popup->insertItem(QWidget::tr("Clef..."),            this, SLOT(clefMenu()), Qt::Key_Y);
00036       popup->insertItem(QWidget::tr("&Key..."),            this, SLOT(keyMenu()), Qt::Key_K);
00037       popup->insertItem(QWidget::tr("&Time..."),           this, SLOT(timeMenu()), Qt::Key_T);
00038       popup->insertItem(QWidget::tr("&Lines..."),          this, SLOT(lineMenu()), Qt::Key_L);
00039       popup->insertItem(QWidget::tr("Note Attributes..."), this, SLOT(noteAttributesMenu()));
00040       popup->insertItem(QWidget::tr("Dynamics..."),        this, SLOT(dynamicsMenu()), Qt::Key_L);
00041 
00042       QMenu* text = new QMenu(parent);
00043       text->setCheckable(false);
00044       popup->insertItem(QWidget::tr("Text..."), text);
00045       text->insertItem(QWidget::tr("Title"),        this, SLOT(cmdAddTitle()));
00046       text->insertItem(QWidget::tr("Subtitle"),     this, SLOT(cmdAddSubTitle()));
00047       text->insertItem(QWidget::tr("Composer"),     this, SLOT(cmdAddComposer()));
00048       text->insertItem(QWidget::tr("Poet"),         this, SLOT(cmdAddPoet()));
00049       text->insertSeparator();
00050       text->insertItem(QWidget::tr("Lyrics"),       this, SLOT(addLyrics()), Qt::CTRL+Qt::Key_L);
00051       text->insertItem(QWidget::tr("Fingering..."), this, SLOT(fingeringMenu()));
00052       text->insertItem(QWidget::tr("Expression"),   this, SLOT(addExpression()), Qt::CTRL+Qt::Key_E);
00053       text->insertItem(QWidget::tr("Technik"),      this, SLOT(addTechnik()), Qt::CTRL+Qt::Key_T);
00054       text->insertItem(QWidget::tr("Tempo"),        this, SLOT(addTempo()), Qt::CTRL+Qt::ALT+Qt::Key_T);
00055       text->insertItem(QWidget::tr("Metronome"),    this, SLOT(addMetronome()), Qt::CTRL+Qt::ALT+Qt::Key_M);
00056 
00057       popup->insertItem(QWidget::tr("Symbols .."), this, SLOT(symbolMenu1()), Qt::Key_Z);
00058       return popup;
00059       }
00060

00248 //---------------------------------------------------------
00249 //   clefMenu
00250 //---------------------------------------------------------
00251 
00252 void MuseScore::clefMenu()
00253       {
00254       if (clefPalette == 0) {
00255             QScrollArea* sa = new QScrollArea;
00256             clefPalette = sa;
00257             SymbolPalette* sp = new SymbolPalette(4, 4, 0, "Clefs");
00258             sa->setWidget(sp);
00259             sp->setGrid(140, 180);
00260             sp->showStaff(true);
00261             for (int i = 0; i < 13; ++i) {
00262                   ::Clef* k = new ::Clef(cs, i);
00263                   sp->addObject(i,  k, "");
00264                   }
00265             sa->setMaximumSize(sp->size() + QSize(5, 5));
00266             connect(sp, SIGNAL(paletteSelected(Element*)),
00267                cs, SLOT(paletteSelected(Element*)));
00268             }
00269       clefPalette->show();
00270       clefPalette->raise();
00271       }
00272 
00273 //---------------------------------------------------------
00274 //   keyMenu
00275 //---------------------------------------------------------
00276 
00277 void MuseScore::keyMenu()
00278       {
00279       static const char* keyNames[] = {
00280             "g-major, e-minor",     "ces",
00281             "d-major, h-minor",     "ges-major, es-minor",
00282             "a-major, fis-minor",   "des-minor, b-minor",
00283             "e-major, cis-minor",   "as-major, f-minor",
00284             "h-major, gis-minor",   "es-major, c-minor",
00285             "fis-major, dis-minor", "b-major, g-minor",
00286             "cis",                  "f-major, d-minor",
00287             "c-major, a-minor"
00288             };
00289 
00290       if (keyPalette == 0) {
00291             keyPalette = new QScrollArea;
00292             SymbolPalette* sp = new SymbolPalette(8, 2, 0, "Key Signature");
00293             ((QScrollArea*)keyPalette)->setWidget(sp);
00294             sp->setGrid(170, 160);
00295             sp->showStaff(true);
00296             for (int i = 0; i < 7; ++i) {
00297                   KeySig* k = new KeySig(cs, i+1, 0);
00298                   sp->addObject(i * 2,  k, keyNames[i*2]);
00299                   }
00300             for (int i = -7; i < 0; ++i) {
00301                   KeySig* k = new KeySig(cs, i, 0);
00302                   sp->addObject((7 + i) * 2 + 1,  k, keyNames[(7 + i) * 2 + 1]);
00303                   }
00304             KeySig* k = new KeySig(cs, 0, 0);
00305             sp->addObject(14,  k, keyNames[14]);
00306             k = new KeySig(cs, 0, 0);
00307             sp->addObject(15,  k, keyNames[14]);
00308             connect(sp, SIGNAL(paletteSelected(Element*)),
00309                cs, SLOT(paletteSelected(Element*)));
00310             }
00311       keyPalette->show();
00312       keyPalette->raise();
00313       }

00319 void MuseScore::timeMenu()
00320       {
00321       if (timePalette == 0) {
00322             timePalette = new QScrollArea;
00323             SymbolPalette* sp = new SymbolPalette(4, 4, 0, "Time Signature");
00324             ((QScrollArea*)timePalette)->setWidget(sp);
00325             sp->setGrid(140, 160);
00326             sp->showStaff(true);
00327 
00328             for (int i = 0; i < TSIG_N; ++i) {
00329                   TimeSig* k  = new TimeSig(cs, i);
00330                   sp->addObject(i,  k, "");
00331                   }
00332 
00333             connect(sp, SIGNAL(paletteSelected(Element*)),
00334                cs, SLOT(paletteSelected(Element*)));
00335             }
00336       timePalette->show();
00337       timePalette->raise();
00338       }

00341 //   lineMenu
00342 //---------------------------------------------------------
00343 
00344 void MuseScore::lineMenu()
00345       {
00346       if (linePalette == 0) {
00347             linePalette = new QScrollArea;
00348             SymbolPalette* sp = new SymbolPalette(4, 1, 0, "Lines");
00349             ((QScrollArea*)linePalette)->setWidget(sp);
00350             sp->setGrid(120, 30);
00351 
00352             Hairpin* gabel0 = new Hairpin(cs);
00353             gabel0->setLen(_spatium * 6);
00354             sp->addObject(0, gabel0, "crescendo");
00355 
00356             Hairpin* gabel1 = new Hairpin(cs);
00357             gabel1->setFlip(true);
00358             gabel1->setLen(_spatium * 6);
00359             sp->addObject(1, gabel1, "diminuendo");
00360 
00361             connect(sp, SIGNAL(paletteSelected(Element*)),
00362                cs, SLOT(paletteSelected(Element*)));
00363             }
00364       linePalette->show();
00365       linePalette->raise();
00366       }

00368 //---------------------------------------------------------
00369 //   noteAttributesMenu
00370 //---------------------------------------------------------
00371 
00372 void MuseScore::noteAttributesMenu()
00373       {
00374       if (noteAttributesPalette == 0) {
00375             noteAttributesPalette = new QScrollArea;
00376             SymbolPalette* sp = new SymbolPalette(10, 2, 0, "NoteAttributes");
00377             ((QScrollArea*)noteAttributesPalette)->setWidget(sp);
00378             sp->setGrid(140, 130);
00379 
00380             for (int i = 0; i < NOTE_ATTRIBUTES; ++i) {
00381                   NoteAttribute* s = new NoteAttribute(cs);
00382                   s->setIdx(NoteAttributeIdx(i));
00383                   sp->addObject(i, s, s->name());
00384 
00385                   connect(sp, SIGNAL(paletteSelected(Element*)),
00386                      cs, SLOT(paletteSelected(Element*)));
00387                   }
00388             }
00389       noteAttributesPalette->show();
00390       noteAttributesPalette->raise();
00391       }

00397 void MuseScore::dynamicsMenu()
00398       {
00399       if (dynamicsPalette == 0) {
00400             dynamicsPalette = new QScrollArea;
00401             SymbolPalette* sp = new SymbolPalette(9, 4, 0, "Dynamics");
00402             ((QScrollArea*)dynamicsPalette)->setWidget(sp);
00403             sp->setGrid(220, 135);
00404 
00405             sp->addObject(0, new Dynamic(cs, DynPPPPPP),   "pppppp");
00406             sp->addObject(1, new Dynamic(cs, DynPPPPP),    "ppppp");

00449 //---------------------------------------------------------
00450 //   barMenu
00451 //---------------------------------------------------------
00452 
00453 void MuseScore::barMenu()
00454       {
00455       if (barPalette == 0) {
00456             barPalette = new QScrollArea;
00457             SymbolPalette* sp = new SymbolPalette(4, 2, 0, "Bars");
00458             ((QScrollArea*)barPalette)->setWidget(sp);
00459             sp->setGrid(140, 160);
00460             sp->showStaff(true);
00461 
00462             struct {
00463                   Bar::BarType type;
00464                   QString name;
00465                   } t[] = {
00466                   { Bar::INVISIBLE_BAR, "invisible" },
00467                   { Bar::BROKEN_BAR,    "broken" },
00468                   { Bar::NORMAL_BAR,    "normal" },
00469                   { Bar::END_BAR,       "End Bar" },
00470                   { Bar::DOUBLE_BAR,    "Double Bar" },
00471                   { Bar::START_REPEAT,  "Start Repeat" },
00472                   { Bar::END_REPEAT,    "End Repeat" },
00473                   { Bar::INVISIBLE_BAR, "Invisible" }
00474                   };
00475             for (unsigned i = 0; i < sizeof(t)/sizeof(*t); ++i) {
00476                   Bar* b  = new Bar(cs);
00477                   b->setHeight(point(Spatium(4)));
00478                   b->setBarType(t[i].type);
00479                   sp->addObject(i,  b, t[i].name);
00480                   }
00481 
00482             connect(sp, SIGNAL(paletteSelected(Element*)),
00483                cs, SLOT(paletteSelected(Element*)));
00484             }
00485       barPalette->show();
00486       barPalette->raise();
00487       }
00488 
00489 //---------------------------------------------------------
00490 //   fingeringMenu
00491 //---------------------------------------------------------
00492 
00493 void MuseScore::fingeringMenu()
00494       {
00495       if (fingeringPalette == 0) {
00496             fingeringPalette = new QScrollArea;
00497             SymbolPalette* sp = new SymbolPalette(1, 5, 0, "Fingering");
00498             ((QScrollArea*)fingeringPalette)->setWidget(sp);
00499             sp->setMag(2);
00500             sp->setGrid(50, 50);
00501 
00502             struct {
00503                   QString s;
00504                   QString name;
00505                   } t[] = {
00506                   { "1", QWidget::tr("Finger 1") },
00507                   { "2", QWidget::tr("Finger 2") },
00508                   { "3", QWidget::tr("Finger 3") },
00509                   { "4", QWidget::tr("Finger 4") },
00510                   { "5", QWidget::tr("Finger 5") },
00511                   };
00512             for (unsigned i = 0; i < sizeof(t)/sizeof(*t); ++i) {
00513                   Fingering* b  = new Fingering(cs);
00514                   b->setText(t[i].s);
00515                   sp->addObject(i,  b, t[i].name);
00516                   }
00517 
00518             connect(sp, SIGNAL(paletteSelected(Element*)),
00519                cs, SLOT(paletteSelected(Element*)));
00520             }
00521       fingeringPalette->show();
00522       fingeringPalette->raise();
00523       }
00524 
00525 //---------------------------------------------------------
00526 //   paletteSelected
00527 //---------------------------------------------------------
00528 
00529 void Score::paletteSelected(Element* obj)
00530       {
00531       canvas()->setState(Canvas::PALETTE);
00532       _paletteObject = obj;
00533       }
00534 
00535 //---------------------------------------------------------
00536 //   addTempo
00537 //---------------------------------------------------------
00538 
00539 void Score::addTempo()
00540       {
00541       Element* e = sel->element();
00542       if (!e) {
00543             printf("no element selected\n");
00544             return;
00545             }
00546       if (e->type() == NOTE)
00547             e = e->parent();
00548       if (e->type() != CHORD && e->type() != REST) {
00549             printf("no Chord/Rest selected\n");
00550             return;
00551             }
00552       Measure* m = ((ChordRest*)e)->segment()->measure();
00553       int tick = e->tick();
00554       if (editTempo == 0)
00555             editTempo = new EditTempo(0);
00556       int rv = editTempo->exec();
00557       if (rv == 1) {
00558             int bpm = editTempo->bpm();
00559             printf("tempo at %d(%s)  %s %d\n",
00560                e->tick(), e->name(), editTempo->text().latin1(), editTempo->bpm());
00561             tempomap->addTempo(tick, int(60000000.0/double(bpm)));
00562             TempoText* tt = new TempoText(this);
00563             tt->setTick(tick);
00564             tt->setStaff(e->staff());
00565             tt->setText(editTempo->text());
00566             m->add(tt);
00567             layout();
00568             startCmd();
00569             refresh |= tt->abbox();
00570             undoOp(UndoOp::AddObject, tt);
00571             endCmd(true);
00572             }
00573       }
00574
